prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Chromatic Percussion, Piano, Bass, Drums, and Guitar, but no Organ.

Style 2:

Style 3:
